mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(user_id, user_password, user_name, user_birth) SELECT #{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userBirth} FROM dual WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.cloth_name, c.cloth_price, c.cloth_discount, c.cloth_defaultImage, c.cloth_id FROM wishlist w JOIN clothes c ON w.cloth_id = c.cloth_id WHERE w.user_seq = #{userSeq};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shoppingcart (user_seq, cloth_id, cloth_color, cloth_size, cloth_totalCount, custom_frontImageUrl, custom_backImageUrl, cloth_date) VALUES (#{userSeq}, #{clothId}, #{clothColor}, #{selectedSize}, #{totalCount}, #{mergedFrontImage}, #{mergedBackImage}, CURDATE())
mapper.select: SELECT sc.custom_frontImageUrl, sc.custom_backImageUrl,sc.cloth_id, sc.cloth_date, sc.cloth_size, sc.cloth_totalCount, sc.cloth_color, c.cloth_discount, c.cloth_name FROM shoppingcart sc JOIN clothes c ON sc.cloth_id = c.cloth_id WHERE sc.user_seq = #{userSeq}
